snippet: The white police officer who fatally shot an unarmed black teenager in a St. Louis suburb has resigned, his lawyer said on Saturday, as activists set out on a 120-mile (193-km) march to protest the killing and a grand jury's decision not to indict...

headline.print_headline: Ferguson Police Officer Who Killed Black Teen Resigns From Force
headline.main: Ferguson Police Officer Who Killed Black Teen Resigns From Force

lead_paragraph: The white police officer who fatally shot an unarmed black teenager in a St. Louis suburb has resigned, his lawyer said on Saturday, as activists set out on a 120-mile (193-km) march to protest the killing and a grand jury's decision not to indict him.
